title: How to Rank on Amazon 2023 - Amazon Keyword Research with the #1 Amazon Keyword Tool

tactics.name: keyword_relevance
tactics.description: Identify keywords directly related to your product to ensure search terms align with customer intent.
source_quotes: there is no point trying to rank... if the keyword isn't relevant to your product

tactics.name: Competitor ASIN Keyword Analysis
tactics.description: Use Cerebro to extract high-performing keywords from top competitors' ASINs
steps: Identify top 3 competitors and extract ASINs
Input ASINs into Cerebro for keyword list
Sort keywords by competitor performance score
caveats: Requires manual filtering for brand-specific terms
source_quotes: this tool is going to provide you with a keyword list based on the keywords that perform the best for those existing products

tactics.name: keyword_misspelling_research
tactics.description: Use Mispellinator to find misspellings of keywords for Amazon listing optimization
source_quotes: choose to select all those that are not auto corrected by amazon
open your misspell folder add keywords and then add them via csv

heuristics.name: review_volume_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews < 200, prioritize keywords with higher review counts
source_quotes: short tail keywords... are the most competitive

heuristics.name: Search Volume Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If keyword search volume is above 1000, prioritize for top positions
source_quotes: order the keywords by search volume high to low

heuristics.name: misspelling_relevance_filter
heuristics.condition: If keyword popularity is below 5% then prioritize for misspelling research
source_quotes: words in the lowest five percent of popularity aren't checked for amazon auto correct

claims.statement: Keywords are equivalent to customer search terms for product discovery
source_quotes: keywords and customer search terms are the exact same thing

claims.statement: Helium 10's Cerebro tool provides keyword lists based on competitor performance scores
source_quotes: this tool is going to provide you with a keyword list based on the keywords that perform the best for those existing products

claims.statement: Highly relevant keywords like 'wood phone docking station' can form the basis of optimized Amazon titles
source_quotes: a great way to start this title would be wood phone docking station for men

niche_patterns.description: Combines product identity with specific use cases to capture niche search intent
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets low-competition long-tail keywords with clear purchase intent
source_quotes: long tail... competition low to medium

niche_patterns.example: phone docking station + valentine's gift + men
niche_patterns.description: Identify keywords combining product features with specific use scenarios and target demographics
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Captures intent-driven search terms with clear buyer personas
source_quotes: men's valentine's gifts this customer may buy our product but they may also buy a different product

niche_patterns.example: wood phone docking station + for men
niche_patterns.description: Combine product identity with functional purpose and target audience
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Captures search intent while incorporating keyword clusters
source_quotes: phone docking station wood phone docking station
